蘥字的基本解释

蘥
yuè
古书上说的一种植物，可作牧草，籽粒作饲料。亦称“雀麦”。

蘥字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yuè］
［《廣韻》以灼切，入藥，以。］
即雀麦。

蘥字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　蘥； 康熙笔画：23； 页码：页1069第36
【唐韻】以灼切，音藥。【玉篇】雀麥也。【爾雅·釋草】蘥，雀麥。【註】卽燕麥。【本草】苗似小麥而弱，實似穬麥而細。　又【說文】蘢，天蘥。見蘢字註。

蘥字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
蘥字的起名意思

暂无。

Humble
Basic explanation of words
Humble
yuè
A kind of plant mentioned in ancient books can be used as forage grass, and its grains can be used as fodder. Also known as "Brome".
Humble
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yuè］
["Guang Yun" is used as medicine, with scorching cut, with. ]
Namely Brome.
Humble
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Zong Zi] 　蘥; Kangxi Strokes: 23; Page Number: Page 1069 Page 36
[Tang Yun] To burn and cut, tone medicine. [Jade articles] Brome also. 【Erya·Shuicao】蘥, brome. [Note] Oatmeal. 【Materia Medica】The seedlings look like wheat but weak, but actually look like stalks and thin.　[Said Wen] Fu, Tianhu. See Note to Chinese Characters.
